message: Former state Sen. Ralph Shortey wept in court Wednesday after being charged with four federal child sex crimes that will require him to spend at least 15 years in prison if convicted. A federal grand jury meeting in Oklahoma City returned a four-count indictment Tuesday charging Shortey, 35, with child sex trafficking and child pornography offenses.

data.description: SEP  6, 2017 - A federal grand jury in Oklahoma City returned an indictment Tuesday charging former Sen. Ralph Shortey with child sex trafficking and child pornography offenses.
data.title: Former Oklahoma state senator accused in federal indictment with child sex trafficking and child pornography offenses
